def_cn: 融入；与…融为一体；与…协调
def_en: If something blends into the background, it is so similar to the background that it is difficult to see or hear it separately.

def_cn: 与…打成一片；成为…的一员；融入
def_en: If someone blends into a particular group or situation, they seem to belong there, because their appearance or behaviour is similar to that of the other people involved.
